official_title: A bill to permit certain leases and float home permits in the Heyburn State Park of Idaho.

summary.text: Permits the leasing of certain land for homesites and the granting of a limited number of float home permits in the Heyburn State Park of Idaho.

titles.title: A bill to permit certain leases and float home permits in the Heyburn State Park of Idaho.
